Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial open-ended clue gathering to list what is visible.
Detailed listing of man-made objects, continuing broad exploration.
Detailed listing of natural elements, further collecting broad environmental clues.

Depth-First.Explanation: Proposes Dublin hypothesis based on key clues and begins verification.
Summarizes and weighs evidence to reinforce the Dublin hypothesis.
Confirms and narrows to a specific Dublin location near cultural institutions.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: After broad clue collection, attention converges on a specific Dublin hypothesis for verification.
